flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=40>>40 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 40*0.1=$<<40*0.1=4>>4
So his purchase came out to 1400-4=$<<1400-4=1396>>1396
#### 1396

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 40. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
